empty.title: No Mentors Found
empty.description: No mentors were found matching your criteria.

tips.title: Search Tips
tips.tip1: Use words in a basic form in the search field, for example, <i>Depression<i> or <i>Childhood Trauma<i>.
tips.tip2: Make sure the search term is spelled correctly.
tips.tip3: It is possible that no mentors match your criteria. Try using less filters.

filters.description: Welcome to browse mentor profiles! You will find the newest mentors at the top of the list. By searching, you're able to filter mentors based on your problem.
filters.title: Search
filters.instructions: You can search for mentors by entering a keyword in the search field (for example, <i>depression<i> or <i>childhood trauma<i>) and/or select ready-made topics through the “Filter by tag” menu.
